org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka

Class KafkaCluster

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.streaming.kafka.KafkaCluster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class KafkaCluster
extends Object
implements scala.Serializable
    :: DeveloperApi :: Convenience methods for interacting with a Kafka cluster. See A Guide To The Kafka Protocol for more details on individual api calls. param: kafkaParams Kafka configuration parameters. Requires "metadata.broker.list" or "bootstrap.servers" to be set with Kafka broker(s), NOT zookeeper servers, specified in host1:port1,host2:port2 form
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
